title: RideWithGPS’ New Layers
content:
As a Premium RideWithGPS subscriber, you can now dial in your planning with 5 new advanced map layers, available anywhere routes or rides are viewed on the web, including the Route Planner…

Unpaved Cycling
Find nearby gravel and singletrack FAST with our new Unpaved Cycling map layer.

Wind Speed & Direction
Nail the perfect weather window with wind speed and direction forecasts up to 30 hours in advance.

Cell Coverage
Stay safe and stay connected with coverage maps displaying voice, data, and service provider.

Air Quality
Avoid wildfire smoke and hazardous air quality with realtime AQI readings in the Route Planner.

Snow Cover
Check realtime snow cover to ensure your planned routes are clear and passable to ride.

Check out more at RideWithGPS.

author: John Watson
